name: UnofficialUniversalStudiosRideTimes
0:
”Alexa, open ride times”
”Alexa, ask Ride Times whats the wait time for Jurassic Park”
”Alexa, ask Ride Times whats the average wait time in Universal Studios”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ride times
des:
Unofficial Universal Studios Ride Times will quickly find you the real time ride wait times for any ride in Universal Studios or Islands of Adventure in Orlando Florida! it can also calculate the average wait time for both parks and even can tell you when a ride is down for maintenance.

If your unsure about a ride you can even ask Alexa what kind of ride the attraction is and she will give you all the information you need! 

Simply ask Alexa things like "Whats the current wait time for the Incredible Hulk" or "Whats the average wait time for Islands of Adventure"

Universal Studios Ride Times are powered by the Wait Smart application which strives to empower fun and relaxing vacations through clear and actionable insights! https://wait-smart.herokuapp.com

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
